name: Redshift Blueshift
description:
TWO SHIPS BATTLE AN ENDLESS WAR IN SPACE AND TIME

Redshift Blueshift is a vicious hyper-paced tournament-ready pong-like 2D shooter in which two pilots fight for glory in their variable paddle ships!

Power up your shields, unleash a horde of drones and homing missiles on your opponent and keep the hyper-ball in play!

Play with two players, single players, keyboard, or 360 Controllers!

HOW TO PLAY:

360 Controller: Right-stick: Move / A: Fire / X: Change Speed
Keyboard: Arrow Keys: Move / X or V: Fire / Z or C: Change Speed

Paddle Mode: Dodge drone fire and missiles and hit the ball!
Fighter Mode: Shoot at anything sharing your ships colors!

RECOMMENDED - TWO PLAYER VS MODE WITH TWO 360 CONTROLLERS

Redshift Blueshift was originally created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 30, where it placed #6 out of 1493 games overall, as well as #2 in the audio category and #7 in the fun category. It was also chosen to be presented at the MAGFest Indie Videogame Showcase in 2015.

Redshift Blueshift was greenlit by the Steam Community! An updated version is available on Steam now, and a new version will be available on itch.io soon! Thank you for all of your support! Those of you who bought the game here will also recieve a Steam key :)

Buy the soundtrack at Bandcamp for just $2, or buy the game here on itch.io to get the soundtrack bundled with the game (320kbps MP3) !

Thanks to Alan McCosh for supporting with development and the Mac build!
Thanks to Lauren Vincelli for giving the Red Pilot a voice!
Thanks to Curtis and Brandy Stroud for running my booth at MAGFest!
